sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react'; import '../Css/ResultCard.css'; import '../Css/Popup.css'; import '../Css/Controls.css'; import { GlobalContext } from '../Global/GlobalState.js'; export const ResultCard = ({ anime }) => { const { moveAnimeToActive, moveAnimeToFinish, moveAnimeToPlanning, removeAnimeBothList, activeAnimeList, finishedAnimeList, planningAnimeList } = useContext(GlobalContext); const [popup, togglePopup] = useState(false); let storedActiveAnime = activeAnimeList.find(o => o.id === anime.id); let storedFinishedAnime = finishedAnimeList.find(o => o.id === anime.id); let storedPlanningAnime = planningAnimeList.find(o => o.id === anime.id); // prevents you from adding already added anime const activeListDisabled = storedActiveAnime ? true : false; const finishedListDisabled = storedFinishedAnime ? true : false; const planningListDisabled = storedPlanningAnime ? true : false; return ( <> { (popup === false) ? (
togglePopup(true)} alt={anime.attributes.canonicalTitle} src={anime.attributes.posterImage.large} />
{anime.attributes.canonicalTitle}
{ activeListDisabled ? : finishedListDisabled ? : planningListDisabled ? : }
{
moveAnimeToActive(anime)} className={activeListDisabled ? "item-active" : "item"}> Watching
moveAnimeToFinish(anime)} className={finishedListDisabled ? "item-active" : "item"}> Watched
moveAnimeToPlanning(anime)} className={planningListDisabled ? "item-active" : "item"}> Planning
removeAnimeBothList(anime.id)} className="item"> Reset
}
) : ( // feature
togglePopup(false)}>
{/* Controls here drop downs*/}
Close
{ activeListDisabled ? (
Watching
) : finishedListDisabled ? : planningListDisabled ? : }
{
moveAnimeToActive(anime)} className={activeListDisabled ? "item-active" : "item"}> Watching
moveAnimeToFinish(anime)} className={finishedListDisabled ? "item-active" : "item"}> Watched
moveAnimeToPlanning(anime)} className={planningListDisabled ? "item-active" : "item"}> Planning
removeAnimeBothList(anime.id)} className="item"> Reset
}
Rating: {anime.attributes.averageRating}
Episodes: {anime.attributes.episodeCount}
Trailer

{anime.attributes.canonicalTitle}

{anime.attributes.description}

) } ) }
